attributes.action: Abolish prescription fees for Asthma sufferers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want prescription fees for asthma sufferers abolished. Diabetics don't have to pay for their insulin so why should asthma sufferers be made to pay for two sometimes three inhalers per month. I believe if you are a long term sufferer of asthma, you should no longer have to pay!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
